text: Éric Roger Pierre Lombard (born 16 May 1958) is a French businessman and politician who has been the minister of economics and finance since 2024. From 2017 to 2024, he was the CEO of the Caisse des dépôts et consignations. He is a former student of HEC Paris. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Boulogne-Billancourt Category:Politicians from Boulogne-Billancourt
title: Éric Lombard
